body_html:
@klappradla Yeaah... I guess I'm supposed to:

  • go to the orga dashboard
  • open the list of teams
  • find a team I want to edit there
  • edit it!

In fact I'm too lazy and use the /teams page, because I can open it much faster from the nav bar. Then I find a team, press the 'Edit' button and manually add the /orga part in the url 🙈 This is my use case at the moment. Maybe I'm not representative though.

In any case, these are low-priority UX reflections which shouldn't affect this PR :)
